title: Yasuo Skin bug (HIGH NOON)
body: when yasuo q's and is leaning after the animation, the hat sometimes glitches into his head. {{champion:157}}{{summoner:14}} {{summoner:4}}

replies.body: Yea, actually i think it might have been either yesterday or the day before. I have to say before 5.17 it was horrible, it's not quite as bad as it was. But i can say that it still happens  a couple times a game, i mean like you have to really pay attention but i like the animations, i have both yasuo skins and PROJECT YASUO has no problems but high noon still has that tiny glitch with the animations here and there. {{item:3742}}  :3
Do you happen to have a screenshot/video? I'm unable to reproduce this on a live environment.
i actually dont but i can play yas and get one for you, when i get one ill send it no problem.

Hey Thoma5,

Is this something you've experienced in game recently? We resolved this issue in Patch 5.17.
